title: (P) Roger Waters - 2012-02-14 - Sydney - ''Wall You Be My Valent
description:
Roger Waters -
Tuesday, February 14, 2012, Allphones Arena,
Sydney, Australia.

Equipment: Tascam DR-07 MK II using the internal microphones.
Location: 3 rows behind the Soundboard and a little to the right.
Sound Quality: Good.

The decision was made to include the last 11:44 min/sec of ''01. The Ambient Sounds Of An Audience In Waiting'' as well as the complete ''20. Intermission'', as i felt it added to the overall atmosphere of the show (for me anyway).
The same recording level was used throughout the entire concert, which will explain why ''01. The Ambient Sounds Of An Audience In Waiting'' and ''20. Intermission'' are lower in volume when you 
listen to it.
